trans-unit.source: In Visual Studio, right-click the project, click **Publish** > **Publish Web** > **Microsoft Azure Web Apps**, and (if needed) sign-in with your Azure credentials.
trans-unit.target: In Visual Studio, right-click the project, click **Publish** > **Publish Web** > **Microsoft Azure Web Apps**, and (if needed) sign-in with your Azure credentials.

trans-unit.source: When you sign in, Visual Studio downloads and stores your publish settings directly from Azure.
trans-unit.target: When you sign in, Visual Studio downloads and stores your publish settings directly from Azure.

trans-unit.source: Select your service from **Existing Web Apps** and click **OK**, then verify the publish information and click **Publish**.
trans-unit.target: Select your service from **Existing Web Apps** and click **OK**, then verify the publish information and click **Publish**.

trans-unit.source: When your Mobile App backend has published successfully, you will see a landing page indicating success.
trans-unit.target: When your Mobile App backend has published successfully, you will see a landing page indicating success.

trans-unit.source: Follow the [instructions for deploying Node.js to a Web App](../articles/app-service-web/web-sites-nodejs-develop-deploy-mac.md)
trans-unit.target: Follow the [instructions for deploying Node.js to a Web App](../articles/app-service-web/web-sites-nodejs-develop-deploy-mac.md)
